short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create recipes using Jupiter's grocery products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To use this extension, simply navigate to your favorite online recipe  (we like NYT Cooking, Tasty, and Half Baked Harvest) and click on the extension. Modify the recipe to your liking and save the recipe -- that's it!

For a more detailed user guide, please visit https://cutt.ly/jupiterextension.
